item.title: Customizing Blogger Template
item.description: I modified it for this version by making some adjustments to the Qn Forum theme.

item.title: IDEAS
item.description: Inference Definition Example Antonym Synonym “IDEAS” is an abbreviation used for learning vocabulary. It serves as a mnemonic device to assist learners in remembering the meanings of new words and how to use them correctly.

item.title: Verbing
item.description: This is my verbing page. It is a page where I write about what I am doing, what I am learning, what I am reading, what I am watching, what I am listening, what I am cycling, what I am playing, and so on. üè† Living Living in Istanbul, üáπüá∑. üè¢ Working I’m enjoying my hiatus!
